name: Critical Injury
effect: The character suffers an especially severe wound. Roll on the Critical Injuries table.

name: Gash
effect: A deep wound cuts into the character's chest.

name: Impaired Arm
effect: The hit wounds the character’s arm, making it difficult to move.

name: Impaired Leg
effect: A direct hit to the leg causes the character to lose mobility.

name: Infected Wound
effect: The wound has been quickly infected—it requires Antibiotics soon or it may never heal.

name: Broken Ribs
effect: A violent hit to the rib cage shatters a few ribs.

name: Slashed Leg
effect: The character's leg suffers a deep cut, making it difficult to maneuver.

name: Banged Head
effect: The character suffers a hit to the head. The shock makes them lose their next turn.

name: Damaged Vision
effect: The character suffers a hit to their face, blurring their vision.

name: Brain Damage
effect: The character suffers a severe hit to the head, damaging their brain and causing partial amnesia.

name: Crushed Fingers
effect: A direct hit to the character’s hand damages their fingers (-5 to Combat skills).

name: Superficial Wound
effect: The character suffers an ugly-looking but superficial cut. No effect.

name: Bruised Brain
effect: The character suffers a blow to the back of the head, temporarily confusing them (-5 INT).

name: Slashed Ear
effect: The character's ear is damaged, reducing their hearing (-5 Perception).

name: Slit Bicep
effect: The character receives an ugly cut to the bicep (-5 STR).

name: Scratched Brow
effect: Their brow suffers a deep scratch, not dealing much damage but bleeding profusely. They must spend the next round wiping the blood from their eyes, clearing their vision.

name: Damaged Nerves
effect: The character suffers some form of nerve damage that induces seizures. Roll a D6 every turn—on a 1 they cannot act during their turn.

name: Blood Loss
effect: A deep wound to their stomach begins bleeding profusely (+2 to all damage received).

name: Savage Blow
effect: The injury was so violent that the character gains 1 Trauma (pg 98).

name: Torn to Pieces
effect: Miraculously, the blow was completely absorbed by the character's clothing. Any gear worn on the wound's location is automatically destroyed.
